GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article:id.description: serves an article by article id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments of a single article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: inserts a comment of a single article into database and responds with comment
